description: Surrogate primary key uniquely identifying this inactivity reason record for joins and references.
System-generated date and time when the record was created or last updated (likely); timezone/meaning should be confirmed with SME.
Business-defined explanation for why a fleet asset or component was set to inactive status or removed from service; drives reporting and disposition processes.
Identifier of the corresponding record in a prior/legacy system for this lookup; used for migration mapping and lineage (likely; confirm with SME).
Name of the legacy source table containing the mapped record; supports cross-system reconciliation and historical traceability (likely; confirm with SME).
